CustomField.description: If this field is set, it overrides the Region to which a Milestone's Transactions will roll up for Regional Actuals, even if its Project is in a different Region. Typically a Milestone's Transactions roll up to its Project's Region. Note that either way, the Transactions will continue to roll up to the same Project's Project Actuals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is set, it overrides the Region to which a Milestone's Transactions will roll up for Regional Actuals, even if its Project is in a different Region. Typically a Milestone's Transactions roll up to its Project's Region.
CustomField.label: Override Project Region
